        public void applyEffect(Player user,
                        java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Player> targets)
        Description copied from class: Effect
        This is the algorithm of the specific effect. It is an abstract method because it must be defined by the class that implements Effect.
        Specified by:
        applyEffect in class Effect
        Parameters:
        user - the Player that wants to apply the effect.
        targets - the targets of the effect. It can be the user itself.
